description: Prioritized rules for translating MIS incident classification (Impact/Scope) into GTCM Simulation Fidelity Profiles.

fidelity_profiles.high_critical: Requires maximum resource allocation, real-time feedback loops, and tertiary validation layers.
fidelity_profiles.medium_severe: Requires detailed state logging and accelerated simulation clock.
fidelity_profiles.low_minimal: Minimal resource use, baseline safety checks only.

resolution_matrix.rationale: Direct threat to core system components.
Criticality demands high response, but scope limits resource drain.
